other_tests.findings: Sinus tachycardia with left axis deviation, left atrial abnormality, early R-wave progression, and ST-segment depressions in the anterior leads.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved ST-segment depressions in the anterior leads noted in a repeat ECG, and normal sinus rhythm with resolution of the ST-segment depressions at the final ECG.

other_tests.findings: Normal-appearing airway with pink frothy secretions, without purulent exudates or bleeding.
Hyperdynamic left ventricular systolic function with a large portion of the posterior mitral leaflet flail, severe mitral regurgitation, and pulmonary hypertension.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative echocardiogram showed preserved biventricular function and trace mitral regurgitation.

other_tests.findings: No evidence of clinically significant obstructive coronary artery disease.
Hyperdynamic left ventricular systolic function with flail segments of the posterior mitral leaflet and evidence of ruptured chordae.
